title: Spineseeker (dNetHack)
data:
| )   Spineseeker                       |                                                                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Base item                             | [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                               |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                              |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d4 **+1d6**                                                                                                                                                 |
| Damage vs. large                      | 1d4 **+1d6**                                                                                                                                                 |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+1**                                                                                                                                                       |
| Bonus versus                          | all monsters                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                              |
| Weapon skill                          | [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                               |
| Size                                  | one-handed                                                                                                                                                   |
| Affiliation                           | [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")                                                                                                                           |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                              |
| When carried                          | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                     |
| When wielded                          | - [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth")
- enables sneak attacks for non-[Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue")
- bonus damage for [backstabs](/wiki/Backstab "Backstab") |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                              |
| Base price                            | 8000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                           |
| Weight                                | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                  |
| Material                              | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                                                                                                                                    |

- *For the artifact in SlashTHEM, see [Spineseeker](/wiki/Spineseeker "Spineseeker").*

**Spineseeker** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")-aligned, and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword").

## Description

Spineseeker has +1 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals +1d6 damage versus all monsters, and grants [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") while wielded. Spineseeker adds an extra die for sneak attacks and enables them for roles other than [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), and [backstabs](/wiki/Backstab "Backstab") (which are defined based on the monster's previous movement) also gain an extra die - these extra dice are the size of the wielder's current [experience level](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level"), and stack with the Rogue's existing sneak attack and backstab.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spineseeker_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

For the artifact in SlashTHEM, see Spineseeker.

Spineseeker is an artifact weapon that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is chaotic-aligned, and its base item is a short sword.

Description

Spineseeker has +1 to-hit and deals +1d6 damage versus all monsters, and grants stealth while wielded. Spineseeker adds an extra die for sneak attacks and enables them for roles other than Rogues, and backstabs (which are defined based on the monster's previous movement) also gain an extra die - these extra dice are the size of the wielder's current experience level, and stack with the Rogue's existing sneak attack and backstab.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
